interpretation: The "person gesturing NO" card represents a firm rejection or denial. This card suggests a need to set clear boundaries and say no to things that do not serve your best interests or values. It may also indicate a need to stand up for yourself and assert your opinions or beliefs. Be mindful of any situations where you may be compromising your own integrity or well-being for the sake of others. Trust your instincts and don't be afraid to say no when necessary. Associated keywords include rejection, denial, boundaries, assertiveness, and integrity.
